p: The effect of incubation with NE and EO on bacterial growth is showed in FigureÂ 4. A significant reduction in bacterial growth was observed after 3 h (about 1.28 log UFC/mL). The greatest effect was found after 24 h of incubation with NE (450 mg/mL, equivalent to 27 mg/mL of EO) that produced a 5 log reduction approximately.
